Trade/Device Name(s): ARKRAY GLUCOCARD M 01-mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GLUCOCARD 01-mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips or palm; for OTC home use by persons with diabetes or in clinical settings by healthcare professionals to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control.
